summary: My private setting ENB. ( good perfomance )  v0.108 TrueHDR
descriptionHtml:
Do you want to have sustained full immersion? This setting ENB will allow you to achieve it. Dark medieval atmosphere, gloomy forests, dark nights and dungeons. Mix a few settings and ENB, and was born like this SCR ENB :) 


1. Visit our Web site and download  http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm
2. Download v0.108 TrueHDR (simplified version) and paste into the folder Skyrim (where Tes.exe)
3. Download my mod and paste into the same folder (Tes.exe) and replace the files.
4.Run Skyrim and play :)

[img]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/6024/90437847.jpg[/img]

[img]http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/2651/14088276.jpg[/img]

[img]http://img337.imageshack.us/img337/3700/98796447.jpg[/img]

[img]http://img137.imageshack.us/img137/5337/82464489.jpg[/img]

[img]http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/4214/64016881.jpg[/img]

[img]http://img138.imageshack.us/img138/6159/60255947.jpg[/img]

[img]http://img848.imageshack.us/img848/2180/22333435.jpg[/img]

For this ENB I recommend mod:

-IMAGINATOR - Visual Control Device for Skyrim/  by MyGoodEye and Gopher
-Immersive Skyrim Thunder V5/  by Wordeee
-Lanterns of Skyrim - Around Cities/  by MannyGT
-Lanterns of Skyrim - Bridges/  by MannyGT
-Lightning during Thunder Storms Mod/  by Minty
-More Snow/  by zappoo
-Nordic Ambient Music/  by diamental
-Real 1st Person View -WIP-/  by RFPV Team
-Realistic Running Speed/  by Nobot16k
-Shadow Striping Fix/  by Miral
-Sounds of Skyrim - The Dungeons/  by Cliffworms
-Sounds of Skyrim - The Wilds/  by Cliffworms


By installing this mod, your game will change beyond recognition :)

Have a nice game and a full immersion in the world of Skyrim :)

PS.
Sorry for my poor English ... Uncle Google will always help ;)


Version 1.1 include two folders: Vignette (with black bars) and NO Vignette (no black bars)

Version 1.2 Coming soon.....................   /Hybrid and FXAA ENB. This version is even more amazing, with no loss of fps./
 


Uninstall: delete previously uploaded files
author: donlucka-alias hashshashin
